title: Pass Me Not, O Gentle Saviour

author.name: Fanny J. Crosby
author.bio: Fanny J. Crosby was an American mission worker, poet, lyricist, and composer. She was one of the most prolific hymnists in history, writing over 8,000 hymns.

lyrics:
Pass me not, O gentle Savior,
Hear my humble cry;
While on others Thou are calling,
Do not pass me by.

CHORUS:
Savior, Savior,
Hear my humble cry;
And while on others
Thou art calling,
Do not pass me by.

Let me at a throne of mercy
Find a sweet relief;
Kneeling there in deep contrition,
Help my unbelief.

Trusting only in Thy merit,
Would I seek Thy face;
Heal my wounded, broken spirit,
Save me by Thy grace.

Thou the Spring of all my comfort
More than life to me,
Whom have I on Earth beside Thee?
Whom in Heaven but Thee?
